sentence.Network_en: In this he was an instance of a complete baseness of spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这一点上他是个无耻之徒的典范.

sentence.Network_en: Fine feathers and scarlet cloaks would not be excuses for baseness and deception.
sentence.Network_cn: 漂亮的帽缨,鲜红的军服也就不能成为开脱卑鄙行径和欺骗手段的工具了.

sentence.Network_en: She would never descend to baseness.
sentence.Network_cn: 她永远不会堕落到卑劣地步.

stems_affixes.word_buile: base低下,基础+born出生→adj.出生低微的
debase降低+ed……的→adj.贬低的;品质恶劣的
base低下,基础+ball球→建立基础打球→垒球
base低下,基础+ment具体物→n.地下室
base低下的+ness表名词→n.卑鄙, 下贱
sub下+base低下,基础→地基下的地基
